short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture a ScreenShot of a video and Convert it to Pdf or download it as Image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Note: If the extension icon does not appear initially, please refresh the page.

The "ScreenShot Snap" extension offers a useful functionality that can greatly enhance a user's browsing experience . Here are a few reasons why a user should consider installing this extension:

Capture Screenshots from Videos: The extension allows users to capture screenshots directly from videos playing in their browser. This can be particularly useful for educational purposes, creating tutorials, or simply saving memorable moments from a video.

Convert Screenshots to PDF: The extension provides the ability to convert the captured screenshots into a PDF document. This can be useful for consolidating multiple screenshots into a single, easily shareable file.

Download Screenshots as Images: In addition to converting screenshots to PDF, users can also download the screenshots as image files. This provides flexibility in how the screenshots can be used and shared.

Easy to Use: The extension is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use. It adds a button to the video controls, making it easy to capture screenshots with a single click.

Local Storage: The extension uses local storage for saving screenshots, ensuring that the user's data remains private and secure.

By installing the "ScreenShot Snap" extension, users can enhance their ability to capture, save, and share content from videos in their browser.
